title: FS T206 Sweeney NY American PSA 4
author: TistaT202

posts.post_title: FS T206 Sweeney NY American PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Looking to fund a potential purchase so trying to move a few cards.  PP F&F preferred but regular PP ok too (mcantista@gmail.com).  S/H in bubble mailer is $3 no matter how many cards you buy.  Please PM me with interest or questions.  Many thanks.

T206 Sweeney P350 - PSA 4 - $48

[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/sweeneyf_zpsc08bd7bd.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/sweeneyr_zpse169482a.jpg[/IMG]


T206 Manning batting P150.  Nice colors, some light creasing - $22 SOLD

[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/T206%20Highlanders/fotoflexer_photo_zps1df733dc.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/T206%20Highlanders/fotoflexer_photo_zps66cf3fe4.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Manning batting Sov150.  Worn and creased. - $22 SOLD

[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/0c4967b0-fdba-4149-a755-476f3bc27725_zpsbec3d2ed.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/56426a6f-fb20-4258-90ec-8d61c2f123f3_zpsf81be10a.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take the Pied Manning. 
PM coming.

Thanks for the deal Mike.
Payment sent.
-Jimmy

You the cards in today.
Excellent deal all around.
Thanks Mike.
